title: Senate Is Poised to Confirm Sessions Along Party Lines - WSJ

organizations.name: confirm sessions along party lines - wsj senate

text:
Senate Is Poised to Confirm Sessions Along Party Lines Vote will elevate a close Trump ally to powerful post By @aviswanatha Feb. 8, 2017 3:07 p.m. ET 
The U.S. Senate is set to confirm Sen. Jeff Sessions (R., Ala.) as attorney general Wednesday evening largely along party lines after days of sometimes angry debate in which Democratic senators questioned their colleague’s commitment to civil rights and independence from the president. 
The confirmation of Mr. Sessions would elevate a close ally of President Donald Trump and one of the Senate’s most conservative members to run the... RELATED VIDEO Sessions Distances From Trump's Rhetoric Sen. Jeff Sessions (R., Ala), during a daylong confirmation hearing, distanced himself from some of Donald Trump's comments on blocking Muslim immigration and said that he would recuse himself from any investigations involving Hillary Clinton's email or foundation. WSJ's Gerald F. Seib reviews the day's testimony. Photo: AP To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
